name: We Must Hold Hands
description:
West and East are very close friends in their childhood 👫, the pair often hold hands🤝 and hangout together. However, as they gets older, events will happen that separates the two. Play through 4 different levels and help West and East find their way back to each other.

We Must Hold Hands was developed in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam, all assets, code and effects are generated during the duration of the Jam. 

A Windows build is available for download at launch but other platforms will soon follow.
